column4: I have a microsoft bluetooth mouse. i've managed to connect it useing the terminal. and i read somewhere on the net that i could alter the lines of  /etc/default/bluez-utils . but when i open it with gedit, there no lines there? im completly new to ubuntu/linux, so if someone could help me with this one, i would be very glad :D
there is either no such file so it is making a new one or the file is empty...
I don't know that - was jsut addressing your file question...
Under admin->services make sure Bluetooth mgt is enabled for a start :)
